metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Greenfield. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Missy Wahlen
Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: ReAnn Holmes, CFP®|AAMS®

heroDescription: Greenfield, Wisconsin, is a vibrant suburban community known for its family-friendly atmosphere and economic opportunities.
landscapeDescription: Greenfield's economy is diverse, with a mix of retail, healthcare, and manufacturing sectors driving growth. The city benefits from its proximity to Milwaukee, enhancing its economic landscape.
uniqueNeeds: Greenfield requires tailored financial services to support its growing population and diverse economic landscape.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Greenfield's retail focus poses risks; diversify into tech and healthcare. Watch for housing market bubbles and prepare for flooding risks due to climate change.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Greenfield's economy has seen a 3% growth rate, driven by retail and healthcare expansions.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Greenfield is $65,000, reflecting a stable economic environment.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Greenfield are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and investment strategies.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Greenfield's cost of living is 10% lower than the national average, making it an attractive place to live.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Greenfield's real estate market is competitive, with home prices rising 5% year-over-year.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Greenfield's business climate is favorable, with low taxes and supportive local policies encouraging new businesses.
